banner_title: Reimagine how you sell with Sales Apps
banner_desc: We help market leaders transform their business.
feature_desc1: Transform your smartphone or tablet into an easy to use point-of-sale. Connect a receipt printer, barcode scanner, and cash drawer.
feature_desc2: Turn once-in-a-while shoppers into regulars. Run loyalty program to reward customers for their recurring purchases
feature_desc3: Imagine resolving every customer service inquiry promptly and proficiently—without a single sloppy handoff or having to scramble for purchase histories.
management_desc: With a customer support platform focused on the features that matter most to service agents, you’ll always have instant access to the exact insights you need.
management_item1_desc: Reach customers across every channel: telephone, email, live chat, and social media.
management_item2_desc: Integrated payments save time, ensure better accuracy and minimize errors.
management_item3_desc: From a single source of truth, you can exceed customer expectations and build bigger shop.
management_item4_desc: You can set your preferences to be alerted only for specific kinds of activities.
management_item5_desc: Create an online catalog of your products, and allow your customers to make purchases directly.
management_item6_desc: We offer real-time shipment monitoring for all of your express pickups and deliveries.
business_desc: Small businesses can now manage their customer relationships more easily than ever
news_desc: Read more about latest news and our special event
